Task Title: Can Remove grouping on certain products and try campaign on them. and monitor the performance
Predicted Intent:
Grouping a set of products is done to give a customer easy access to products that are very similar to one that led them to the website. It provides very similar options and helps improve the chances of them placing an order. For example, all colors of a product can be grouped.
The downside of grouping though, is that once it's done, only one of the grouped products will be shown in the ad. For this reason, we avoid grouping, unless we're going to run a banner/video ad on a product.
